name: Jaywalker (WindowsOfOpportunity)
description:
My First Game Jam Winter 2023 Submission

Description:

For too long, cars have ruled the streets and no longer are you content to wait for the green walk signal. Jaywalker puts you in the shoes of a rebellious pedestrian who must dodge busy traffic and get to the other side in one piece. Cross the road and gain points, as your score gets higher the cars will speed up in an effort to thwart your reclamation of the city streets. 

In Collaboration with:

BorrowedTime1
